adHeader: **DON'T PAY MORE SMALL MOVE & DELIVERY $60/HR TWO GUYS + PICKUP TRUCK*
adDetails: Studio Small Moves perfect for students.Deliveries.Haul and Dump. Move your things ,boxes, suitcases,furniture,mattress,box spring, dining table,chairs, chest,dresser,armoire,desk, futon,sofa bed,couch,loveseat,bookcase. Delivery of any furniture from IKEA or any store to your place. We can assemble any new furniture and disassemble too. Haul and Dump any old couch,mattress, or any old furniture. We have hand truck, dollies, shrink wraps, tarps,ropes and all the necessary tools for the job. We work 7days/week from: 8am to 10pm . Just call or leave your message to show contact info
